name: Trails.by
overview:
In simplest terms, Trails.by is a beautiful and broadly-focused website that aggregates Trails, which are a simple visual way to Curate, Share and Influence with your favorite online information.

At Trails.by, we are doing two things: creating a platform which bridges Q&A and social bookmarking, and optimizing how organizations, bloggers and individuals ‘curate, share, influence.’

Trails.by simply aggregates, standardizes, visualizes and makes it easy to find and share the curated lists of URLs that people already make and share on the web. For example, those questions are often: ‘Where are the best panels at a particular conference?’ or ‘What are the must-see bands and parties during SXSW?’

Trails also have a broader application, and can include questions on any topic: ‘How do I plan a destination wedding?’ to ‘How do I choose a 401k, and what is a 401k?’, ‘How do I pick a laptop for my high school student?’

offices.address1: 925 S Capital of Texas Hwy, Ste B245
